name: Unnamed Project

entity_types.name: TechnologyCompany
entity_types.description: Firms that design, manufacture, and sell consumer electronics and software.

attributes.name: legal_entity_name
attributes.description: The official registered name of the company.

attributes.name: market_valuation
attributes.description: The current estimated market value or stock ticker.

attributes.name: primary_product_line
attributes.description: The main category of hardware or software they produce.

entity_types.name: TechReviewer
entity_types.description: Individuals or accounts that test and provide opinions on new technology products.

attributes.name: platform_handle
attributes.description: The social media username or channel name.

attributes.name: expertise_niche
attributes.description: Specific area of focus, such as mobile displays or batteries.

entity_types.name: MarketAnalyst
entity_types.description: Professionals who study market trends and predict future industry shifts.

attributes.name: firm_name
attributes.description: The financial or research firm they are affiliated with.

attributes.name: prediction_focus
attributes.description: The specific market sector they analyze.

entity_types.name: MediaOutlet
entity_types.description: Organizations that publish news, reports, and articles about the tech industry.

attributes.name: publication_title
attributes.description: The name of the newspaper, website, or TV station.

attributes.name: audience_reach
attributes.description: Description of the scale of their readership.

entity_types.name: Executive
entity_types.description: High-ranking individuals in tech companies who make strategic decisions.

attributes.name: job_role
attributes.description: The specific title, such as CEO or VP of Engineering.

attributes.name: employer_org
attributes.description: The company they currently lead.

entity_types.name: Investor
entity_types.description: Individuals or entities that provide capital to tech companies and react to market news.

attributes.name: investment_style
attributes.description: Whether they are institutional, venture capital, or retail.

attributes.name: portfolio_size
attributes.description: General scale of their investment holdings.

entity_types.name: ResearchInstitution
entity_types.description: Labs or universities developing foundational technologies like quantum batteries.

attributes.name: research_specialty
attributes.description: The scientific field they focus on.

attributes.name: funding_type
attributes.description: How the research is financed.

entity_types.name: Consumer
entity_types.description: End users who purchase tech products and share their experiences online.

attributes.name: brand_preference
attributes.description: The specific brand the user is loyal to.

attributes.name: adoption_speed
attributes.description: Whether they are an early adopter or a late majority user.

entity_types.name: Person
entity_types.description: Fallback type for any natural person not covered by specific categories.

attributes.name: full_legal_name
attributes.description: The person's full name.

attributes.name: social_bio
attributes.description: A short description of the person's profile.

entity_types.name: Organization
entity_types.description: Fallback type for any group or entity not covered by specific categories.

attributes.name: org_full_name
attributes.description: The full name of the organization.

attributes.name: entity_type_desc
attributes.description: Description of what kind of organization it is.

edge_types.name: COMPETES_WITH
edge_types.description: Indicates a competitive relationship between two technology companies.

edge_types.name: REVIEWS_PRODUCT_OF
edge_types.description: A reviewer evaluating a product released by a company.

edge_types.name: PREDICTS_TREND_FOR
edge_types.description: An analyst making a market forecast regarding a company or sector.

edge_types.name: REPORTS_ON
edge_types.description: A media outlet covering news about a company or individual.

edge_types.name: WORKS_FOR
edge_types.description: An individual employed by a specific organization.

edge_types.name: INVESTS_IN
edge_types.description: An investor putting capital into a company.

edge_types.name: PURCHASES_FROM
edge_types.description: A consumer buying products from a company.

edge_types.name: RESPONDS_TO
edge_types.description: One entity reacting to the actions or posts of another.

analysis_summary: The ontology is designed to simulate the social media discourse surrounding the 2025 smartphone market competition between Apple and Samsung. It captures key actors such as tech reviewers, market analysts, and media outlets who drive the narrative, while providing fallback types for general users and organizations to ensure all social media participants are represented.
